name: Snowboard Xtreme
description:
Xtrem Snow offers a race against the clock through a stage filled with dangers

in which you will need a lot of skill, because time is not on your side.

To do so, try to take full advantage of the terrain. You also earn extra time

by passing through the flags correctly.

Beat your friends and family on the Local Ranking and reach

Number 1.

Features

-Arcade game.
-Learn to use the snowboard.
-Local Ranking to compete against friends.
